Posts.Content: Thank you for the update.   I pray for Claudia daily.  I have been worried about her since she has been so quiet and have been thinking of her a lot.   She is such a gentle, wise woman and I miss hearing from her.    I will continue the prayers for her and her wonderful Reggie.   I sure hope she knows how many people love her...
